appDescription.message: Gemini-powered AI tool to summarize YouTube videos.

prompt_too_long.message: Prompt is too long. The text will be cut...

cannot_load_transcript.message: Cannot load transcript for this video. Please try again.

transcript_does_not_exist.message: This video doesn't have transcripts. Please try another.

review_message_strip_body.message:
Dear User,

We're glad you've chosen our
extension!

Would you mind sharing your
experience with us? Your opinion will
help us improve.

Thank you!

welcome_message_strip_header.message: Click here to get a quick summary.

update_message_body.message:
Settings Button Added - easily customize your preferences.

Improved Translations - better language support across all languages.

Copy Button Added - quickly copy text with one click.

popup_support_description.message: The Extension is fully free, but you can still support my work and server maintenance costs. I really appreciate your help. Thank you!

main_description.message: Go to any YouTube video and click summarize button.

review_call_to_action.message:
Thank you for choosing our extension! If you find these improvements valuable, please consider supporting us.

Your donation helps us keep the extension free and continue making it better for you. What's New:
